question: Bring out the only incorrect statement:
option1: Jorwe culture was most prominent in Maharashtra
option2: Hathonora is a site where a true hominid fossil was found
option3: The Earliest evidence of Rice cultivation has come from Belan Valley
option4: The people of all sites in Rajasthan during the Neolithic age were aware of Bricks
answer: The people of all sites in Rajasthan during the Neolithic age were aware of Bricks
explanation: The people of all sites in Rajasthan during the Neolithic age were aware of Bricks D is the incorrect statement. People of Gilund in Rajasthan were NOT aware of bricks
